content: it is a small pouch with drawstring where you can fit small things like keys chapsticks approximate size width 8 5cm/3 5 inches height 10cm/4 inches it is a simple pattern with single_crochet half double crochets double_crochet and bobble stitch it require seaming along the sides you can modify the pattern to make a bigger or smaller pouch details are given in the pattern to make this pattern you need less than one skein it is perfect to use up those scraps
